thread.section_title: Inkfarm.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Inkfarm.com | www.inkfarm.com
thread.title: Nancy

author: Nancy
title: Nancy
text: Is it just me or does it upset anyone else when you see the ridiculous prices the big box stores try to rape you to replace your ink cartridges? I thought I'd give Inkfarm.com a try because it was worth the gamble AND so simple just to look at my printer, match up the name of it on their website's list and find which cartridge color I needed. Well I ordered.... my printer works great, the ink is good quality. I had a question about the compatibility of the cartridges sizes before I ordered so I called and actually talked to someone I could actually understand in my own language. The man was courteous to me and his information was exactly what I needed to get my printer correctly running again. I definitely will use this company for future orders!
